roleset.name: turn around one's fortune

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: The whole idea of computer - integrated manufacturing , CIM , seems to be making a comeback after losing a little luster over the past couple of years when it became apparent that it was n't a panacea that would make U.S. plants more efficient and banish foreign competition .
example.arg: The whole idea of computer - integrated manufacturing , CIM

example.name: Only argument
example.text: Despite losing 2 original members, Alexander and Kibum, U-Kiss is still going strong for their comeback with the new members, AJ and Hoon.

roleset.note: COMEBACK-N NOTES: Based on instances in nouns-lv; no corresonding VN class. (from comeback.01-n)
